resources.string: This is a channel for quick actions.
This is a channel for usual alerts.
Foreground screenshot service running right now.
No screenshot permission. To use this module you need to retry and confirm the permission in the next window.
Right after the card is popped upRight after the card is popped up
Recommended when tile service works poorly
When you want to restore data in the future
When you want to view data in your computer
When you have a backup from this app
When you have data exported from Alipay
When you have data exported from Wechat

1 Quick Action 
Quick-Action is a small window which is supposed to be fast so it can offer you a convenient way of recording income and expenditure. 

︎︎1.1 Brief Mode 
Date and time will be hidden in window and set to current time. If you scarcely adjust them, turning on this feature will give you a cleaner view. 

1.2 Take Screenshot Immediately 
Screenshots are designed for situations where you barely have time to create a record so you want to take a screenshot and enter the details according to it later. We suggest you delete those screenshots to save storage space when you complete a record. If you frequently take screenshots, you can turn this feature on. 

1.3 Show Quick-Action in Notification Center 
Quick-Actions can be found both in quick settings as a tile button and in notification center(if you turn on this feature). Due to restrictions made by Google, in those latest SDKs, a tile service can not launch an activity in 5s once you press HOME button. This may lead to poor experience when you are really short of time. 
Besides, those SDKs do not allow permanent permission for screenshots. Turning on this feature allows saving a permission as long as the application is alive. 

2 Data 
Backing up or restoring your data. 

2.1 Export as JSON 
JSON is a flexible format easy for procedures to extract data. Exporting data as JSON allows future restoring. 

2.2 Export as CSV 
CSV is just like a spreadsheet but in a simpler format. You can view it in your computer. 

2.3 Import from JSON 
For Data restoring. 

2.4 Import from CSV(Alipay) 
You should follow the instructions on Alipay official website to export your income and expenditure details as CSV. Put it in storage of your phone and select it in file selecting view that popped up. Then data will be imported to our database if the file is in correct format. 

2.5 Import from CSV(Wechat) 
Similar to 2.4.
